description: OpenDocument databases contain a collection of files and folders compressed with Zip compression. They include settings.xml , context.xml , and manifest.xml files, as well as a database folder that contains the following files:
NOTE: The Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards (OASIS) maintains the OpenDocument standard.
